sentence: We can't control polls that will more than likely underestimate the power of Georgia's voters of color or the commentary from pundits who were wrong about Georgia in 2020 and 2021, but we can make sure Georgians learn about the record of our eventual opponent, whether it's Brian Kemp, David Perdue, or Kandiss Taylor,? said Seth Bringman, an Abrams campaign spokesman.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans lead Abrams in Georgia: poll
